title: UPDATE: the 12 y/o girl who got raped in ujjain is currently in arvindo hospital in indore
selftext:
[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/madhya-pradesh-four-more-detained-in-ujjain-rape-case/articleshow/104013706.cms?from=mdr](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/madhya-pradesh-four-more-detained-in-ujjain-rape-case/articleshow/104013706.cms?from=mdr) \- TOI's update report  


[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TIynNFZdY44](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TIynNFZdY44) \- priest's (who helped her and took her to police) interview  


Girl is from satna who was reported missing by her grandfather. her mother doesn't live with the family since her childhood, father is mentally unstable. local police inspector has taken up the responsibilty for her treatment, further studies, marriage (adopted her).

read TOI's report for further details.
